translation.en: [man 1] Looking at a horse when he's standing still looks magical,
translation.ja: 馬の立つ姿は神秘的

translation.en: but when he's running, you know, it's like, they should have wings.
translation.ja: 一方で 走る姿は翼が生えているようだ

translation.en: There's a lot of horses I've been given, um, on this ranch
translation.ja: ここの牧場にいるのは よそじゃ手に負えなかった馬が多い

translation.en: that, uh, were problem horses that other people couldn't handle.
translation.ja: よそじゃ手に負えなかった馬が多い

translation.en: Line up, boys!
translation.ja: 並んで！

translation.en: Once you start working them
translation.ja: 馬たちと一緒に働き始めると

translation.en: and you find their niche, what they're gonna be and what they can do…
translation.ja: いいところや個性得意なことが見えてくる

translation.en: Good girl.
translation.ja: よし

translation.en: …you know, they fit in quite well.
translation.ja: うまくいくんだ

translation.en: [man 2] No one can classify themselves as a horse master.
translation.ja: “馬の達人”なんて誰も名乗れない

translation.en: My father can classify himself as a horse trainer,
translation.ja: でも父は調教師と名乗れる

translation.en: 'cause he's trained horses to do incredible feats.
translation.ja: すごい技を馬に仕込むからね

translation.en: -It's not just someone doing a trick. -[clicking tongue] It's like they become really good friends.
translation.ja: 芸をさせるだけじゃなく馬と本当に親しくなるの

translation.en: [man 1] Smile, guys. Smile.
translation.ja: みんな 笑って

translation.en: Yay! Good!
translation.ja: いいね

translation.en: [woman] But you lose the Robin that I married for a little while.
translation.ja: しばらく夫を奪われる気分

translation.en: But it's… it's worth it to see what the result is, the magic that he creates.
translation.ja: でも彼が魔法をかけるにはしかたがない

translation.en: [Robin] When you get a new horse and you don't know what his history was…
translation.ja: どんな経緯を たどったのか分からない馬も来る

translation.en: sometimes it takes a little bit to get across that edge.
translation.ja: その壁を越えるには少し時間がかかる場合もある

translation.en: [Robin] Some of the… the wildest horses that you come across,
translation.ja: かなり荒々しい馬も来る そういう馬たちの瞳は野生的で光ってる

translation.en: and you get them, and you see that spark in their eye, and they're wild.
translation.ja: そういう馬たちの瞳は野生的で光ってる

translation.en: You know deep down, you can see it in their eye, there's a better side to this horse.
translation.ja: でも瞳を よく見ればいいところもあると分かる

translation.en: [Robin] I grew up with horses always around me.
translation.ja: 私は馬に囲まれて育った

translation.en: I was raised in a little country town in Australia.
translation.ja: オーストラリアの田舎町でね

translation.en: I wasn't small, but I would be called the runt of the litter.
translation.ja: 体は小さくなかったが家族じゃチビ扱い

translation.en: I didn't speak that well. I couldn't read. I was a loner.
translation.ja: 話下手だし 字が読めず１人が好きだった

translation.en: I was happy with a horse.
translation.ja: 馬との時間が好きでね

translation.en: When you can't communicate with other people, you're ostracized a little bit.
translation.ja: 人付き合いが苦手だと周囲から距離を置かれる

translation.en: That's why I was pushed to my grandparents,
translation.ja: だから人生を変えるべく祖父母に預けられてね

translation.en: to try to change my life, which it changed my life.
translation.ja: だから人生を変えるべく祖父母に預けられてね 確かに変わった

translation.en: I looked up to my granddad, and he had a stern voice.
translation.ja: 私は祖父を尊敬していた

translation.en: And, you know, he was a highly decorated war hero,
translation.ja: 私は祖父を尊敬していた 祖父は戦争の英雄でね

translation.en: and he'd been in the Light Horse Brigade in Australia, you know.
translation.ja: オーストラリアの軽騎兵旅団にいた

translation.en: And that's such a… a huge honor to fight for your country on horseback.
translation.ja: 馬に乗り国のために戦うなんて 名誉だよ

translation.en: But… I've never seen love in my… granddad's eyes.
translation.ja: だけど 祖父の瞳には決して愛情が宿ってなかった

translation.en: We always ate at the table together. And then he'd look straight down at his food,
translation.ja: 食事の時はまっすぐ料理を見下ろし

translation.en: and then he'd look up again and just look straight through you.
translation.ja: 私のこともまっすぐ見ていた

translation.en: That stare.
translation.ja: 忘れえぬ視線だ

translation.en: Just before he passed away in hospital, and… and he'd still give me that look.
translation.ja: 病院で亡くなる直前もやはり私を凝視してた

translation.en: [announcer] What did you think of his efforts tonight? [Robin] That's always been at the back of my mind, you know, what my granddad had said to me, you know?
translation.ja: 祖父に言われたことは常に頭の片隅にあった

translation.en: "You'll amount to nothing."
translation.ja: “お前は何者にもなれん”

translation.en: My grandma was very soft-spoken.
translation.ja: 祖母は優しく話しかけてくれた

translation.en: When I was young, I would look at a book.
translation.ja: 若い頃 私は本を見てた

translation.en: Instead of opening up and going from the top, I would start from the bottom, and she said,
translation.ja: ページの上からじゃなく下から見るんだ

translation.en: "Now start from this side here
translation.ja: 祖母に言われたよ

translation.en: and then follow it down again and again and again."
translation.ja: “そこから何度も字を追いなさい”

translation.en: And I think that's what's helped me pass this on to my training.
translation.ja: 調教するのに役立ってると思う

translation.en: You know, it was that repetition of doing it.
translation.ja: 同じことの繰り返しだからね

translation.en: She said, "Believe in what you are." "And if you want to do it through the horses, do it."
translation.ja: 祖母は“自分を信じて馬で生きればいいわ”と

translation.en: Just be very gentle with them, and they will give back a lot more love to you.
translation.ja: “優しく扱えばより深い愛を返してくれる”

translation.en: You know, I… I like a man who watches things going around.
translation.ja: 周りを よく見てる男が俺は好きだ

translation.en: It means he'll make his mark someday.
translation.ja: いつか成功するぞ

translation.en: [Robin] I would say I was about 10 or 11.
translation.ja: 10歳か11歳の時だった

translation.en: I went into this movie theater, and… I was mesmerized.
translation.ja: 映画館に行ったんだが夢中になったよ

translation.en: You know, it was so large, the screen. It's just wide, and… the animals running towards you.
translation.ja: 広いスクリーンいっぱいに動物たちが走ってくる

translation.en: And the whole attire,
translation.ja: 広いスクリーンいっぱいに動物たちが走ってくる そして あの帽子にブーツにスカーフ

translation.en: I mean, the hat, the boots, and the scarf.
translation.ja: そして あの帽子にブーツにスカーフ

translation.en: Especially their mannerism and how they got on a horse, you know? It's just like, "Oh, wow."
translation.ja: 馬に乗る特徴的なシーンには見とれたよ

translation.en: I went back the next day.
translation.ja: 翌日も見に行った

translation.en: Every time I watched a western with a horse doing something unusual,
translation.ja: 西部劇で 馬の芸を見るたび

translation.en: you know, I'm gonna copy that and just see if I can do it better.
translation.ja: うまくできるかマネしてみた

translation.en: My first trick was the lay-down position,
translation.ja: まだ小さくて馬に乗れなかったから

translation.en: because I wasn't that big to… to get on the horse.
translation.ja: まだ小さくて馬に乗れなかったから 最初に馬に教えたのは横になることだった

translation.en: So I had to teach him to lay down so I could get on him.
translation.ja: 最初に馬に教えたのは横になることだった

translation.en: Good boy. Whoa.
translation.ja: いい子だ　よし

translation.en: I wanted to get into the picture business, because I wanted to train horses.
translation.ja: 映画業界に入り馬を訓練したかった

translation.en: But all the lots in Hollywood got rid of all the horses,
translation.ja: でもハリウッドじゃ西部劇は おしまい

translation.en: because it was just after Star Wars. Westerns were done.
translation.ja: 「スター･ウォーズ」が大流行したからね

translation.en: Moving 10,000 miles across the world… [chuckles] …to America,
translation.ja: アメリカにはるばる渡ったのに——

translation.en: it felt like you just had a brick dropped right on the back of your neck.
translation.ja: とんでもない状況だった

translation.en: I'm not gonna make it. It's over.
translation.ja: 絶望したし終わりだと思った

translation.en: There was still a desire to stay here and work it out.
translation.ja: でも ここに残り何とかしたい気持ちもあった

translation.en: Once I got to Wyoming, I knew this was home.
translation.ja: ワイオミングに着いた時“ここが我が家だ”と思った

translation.en: Getting up early in the morning, and I… I think it was the first morning
translation.ja: 荷物と一緒にここへ やって来た翌朝に

translation.en: after pulling the chuck wagon in on this little lot.
translation.ja: 荷物と一緒にここへ やって来た翌朝に 早く目が覚めた

translation.en: And… seeing the horses right there with me,
translation.ja: その時 そばにいる馬たちが目に入って

translation.en: there was no going back. It was my dream to train.
translation.ja: “夢だった調教師を諦めたくない”と

translation.en: My, uh, third horse
translation.ja: 私にとって３頭目の馬はジュニパー

translation.en: was Juniper, and which… changed my life completely.
translation.ja: 私にとって３頭目の馬はジュニパー 人生を変えた馬だ

translation.en: When I looked in Juniper's eyes, there was a little bit of a sadness there.
translation.ja: ジュニパーは少し悲しげな瞳をしていた

translation.en: Even though it might have been in his past, I'd seen something bigger.
translation.ja: 何か訴えかけてくるような瞳だった

translation.en: That horse was so smart.
translation.ja: 賢い馬でね

translation.en: He had that gift.
translation.ja: 素質だろう

translation.en: Juniper had this wonderful rear. He had great balance. Unbelievable.
translation.ja: 後ろ脚で立つのが得意でバランス感覚が優れていた

translation.en: A horse like that, it only comes once in a lifetime.
translation.ja: あんな馬とは生涯に一度しか出会えない

translation.en: You like Robin? Hey, do you like me?
translation.ja: 私のことは好きか？

translation.en: -[whinnies] -Of course you do.
translation.ja: だよな

translation.en: [Robin] When I got here, even though the westerns had finished, but these old cowboys still were alive,
translation.ja: 西部劇が終わりを迎えてもカウボーイたちは生きていた

translation.en: it was about two years later, I run into Darrell Winfield.
translation.ja: ここへ来て２年後ダレルに出会った

translation.en: Wow, that's the Marlboro Man. He was the real deal.
translation.ja: マールボロの広告の彼さ すごい男だよ

translation.en: Darrell said, "Robin, I've heard you've got a horse that can rear."
translation.ja: “後ろ脚で立つ馬がいる”と聞いたらしい

translation.en: "Can you put a rider on him, and can you cue him behind camera to rear?"
translation.ja: “人を乗せたままできるか？”と聞かれて

translation.en: I said, "Well, I've got, uh, Juniper over here."
translation.ja: “ジュニパーなら”と答えた

translation.en: It was definitely my first audition.
translation.ja: それが初オーディション

translation.en: I got the part. I got a job.
translation.ja: 合格し 仕事につながった

translation.en: [Robin] When you get storyboards, you look at them, you go,
translation.ja: 絵コンテをもらうとこう思う

translation.en: "Wow, okay, I think I can do better than that."
translation.ja: “これよりうまくできそうだ”

translation.en: And action!
translation.ja: アクション

translation.en: Good.
translation.ja: よし

translation.en: Good boy.
translation.ja: いい子だ

translation.en: I know, especially my horses, and… they all enjoy working.
translation.ja: うちの馬はみんな楽しんで働いてるし

translation.en: You know, they find their niche.
translation.ja: 得意分野がある

translation.en: I think, when you get on set, you know, you know where you started from with the horse.
translation.ja: 現場に入ると馬と何をしていたか思い出す

translation.en: The building blocks that went into it.
translation.ja: 細々とした動きをね

translation.en: And that's when the orchestra comes out.
translation.ja: まるでオーケストラの始まりだ

translation.en: He's performing in front of you, and he's performing in front of that camera.
translation.ja: 自分とカメラの前で馬が技を見せている

translation.en: He's showing off his art.
translation.ja: 芸術を披露してるんだ

translation.en: Good boy!
translation.ja: いい子だ

translation.en: Good!
translation.ja: いいね

translation.en: Kick! Good boy!
translation.ja: キック！　よし

translation.en: First lesson's pretty good.
translation.ja: 最初の練習は上出来

translation.en: Smart horse.
translation.ja: 賢い馬だ

translation.en: Come on, young lady.
translation.ja: おいで

translation.en: Come around.
translation.ja: こっちだ

translation.en: One second on camera, when you look into it…
translation.ja: カメラの前で１秒 芸をするには

translation.en: -[clanging] -…it's weeks and hours of training.
translation.ja: 何週間もの訓練が必要だ

translation.en: Come on. Come on. Come on.
translation.ja: ほら 頼むよ

translation.en: Good, kids!
translation.ja: いいぞ

translation.en: I use a… a whip or pointer, and it's not there to, um, touch the horse.
translation.ja: 私は馬には触れずムチなどを使っている

translation.en: I'd use a pointer, or I would use a lunge whip as a sound.
translation.ja: ムチの音を利用してるんだ

translation.en: All right, here we go, guys!
translation.ja: さあ 始めるぞ

translation.en: It's just to guide him to go away from you… Good, kids! …or come to you.
translation.ja: 馬を自分から遠ざけたり近づけたりするためにね

translation.en: [whistles] Come to me.
translation.ja: おいで

translation.en: Eye contact is very important with everything.
translation.ja: アイコンタクトはとても重要だ

translation.en: It's just like a human. You know when you first meet a person?
translation.ja: アイコンタクトはとても重要だ 人間と同じだよ

translation.en: Good. Good. Okay, you found your mark. Pirouette.
translation.ja: いいぞ　よし 印を見つけたな ピルエット

translation.en: Come.
translation.ja: こっち

translation.en: You might be right-handed. I'm left-handed. And that is exactly the same with a horse on each side of his eye.
translation.ja: 私は左利きだが逆の人もいる馬の両目も全く同じなんだ

translation.en: You got to train with one side first and then go to the other side.
translation.ja: まず一方の目で次に逆の目で練習する

translation.en: Once you got both eyes, then you can cue them from anywhere around the camera.
translation.ja: 撮影時どの位置からでも合図を出せるようにね

translation.en: Pirouette.
translation.ja: ピルエット

translation.en: And… good gal!
translation.ja: いい お嬢さんだ

translation.en: Bravo! Bravo! That was beautiful, Em.
translation.ja: ブラボー！　見事だった

translation.en: A pirouette is so graceful, and they can hold their front feet, where she'll pivot all the way around.
translation.ja: ピルエットは優雅で前脚を中心に円を描ける

translation.en: And it's just… it's like going out into a waltz.
translation.ja: ピルエットは優雅で前脚を中心に円を描ける ワルツのようにね

translation.en: [Robin] And when you've got both eyes in sync, it's just like playing the piano,
translation.ja: 両目が うまく合うとピアノを弾いてるみたいだ

translation.en: 'cause they're playing their music in front of you.
translation.ja: 馬たちが音楽を奏でてくれる

translation.en: Imagine the power you'd feel if you had 50 horses charging towards you.
translation.ja: 50頭の馬が走ってくるのを想像してほしい

translation.en: Whoa! You're a big girl.
translation.ja: 大きな女だな

translation.en: I seen this, uh, in a circus book when I was a kid.
translation.ja: 子供の頃 サーカスの本でこれを見た

translation.en: A Clydesdale standing on top of a… a teeter-totter.
translation.ja: クライズデール種がシーソーの上に立つ

translation.en: And I always wanted to recreate it.
translation.ja: 再現してみたかった

translation.en: I just want to get her to balance it now and just hold the weight.
translation.ja: 重心を動かさずバランスを取るんだ

translation.en: Steady. Nope.
translation.ja: そうじゃない

translation.en: Steady.
translation.ja: 落ち着いて

translation.en: You have to gradually let them feel, smell you…
translation.ja: 自分の感覚や匂いを少しずつ覚えさせていくんだ

translation.en: and then you've got that touch with them.
translation.ja: そうすればやがて触れ合える

translation.en: I'll look back on some of the magical stuff that I put together with horses.
translation.ja: 馬と成し遂げた魔法の瞬間を将来 思い出すだろう

translation.en: You know, if it's not on film, it's like it never happened.
translation.ja: たとえ映像に残らなくてもね

translation.en: Look at that balance! That's balance!
translation.ja: そのバランスだ

translation.en: Yes!
translation.ja: やった！

translation.en: [Robin] A paragon pioneer
translation.ja: 開拓者の手本となる人物は今を生きながらも——

translation.en: is a person that's living in the present but… believes in the past as well.
translation.ja: 開拓者の手本となる人物は今を生きながらも—— 過去も重視している

translation.en: Sometimes you feel like you've been there before.
translation.ja: 懐かしい雰囲気だよ

translation.en: Welcome! Welcome!
translation.ja: さあ 歩いて

translation.en: Little bit of history here, guys.
translation.ja: 歴史ある土地だぞ

translation.en: [woman] Robin is very passionate about recreating the old Wild West.
translation.ja: ロビンは かつての西部を再現しようと熱心よ

translation.en: And we're all proud of it, because we all participate in some way.
translation.ja: みんな何かしら関わってるし誇りに思うわ

translation.en: [man] The cowboy dream is dying off, but for my father, no, he's definitely a full-blown cowboy.
translation.ja: カウボーイになるって夢を父は かなえた

translation.en: [Robin] It makes me feel like when I first got to America.
translation.ja: アメリカに来た時の気分だ

translation.en: Just want to keep it alive.
translation.ja: 忘れたくない

translation.en: Welcome, boys! Welcome!
translation.ja: ほら 止まらないで

translation.en: ♪ Paint your wagon Come along ♪
translation.ja: 荷馬車を塗装して　　　　　さあ 行こう

translation.en: ♪ Gotta dream, boy Gotta song ♪
translation.ja: 夢を胸に 歌いながら

translation.en: We're going home, baby!
translation.ja: 家へ向かうぞ

translation.en: [Robin] My horses, when I… talk about them…
translation.ja: 私は自分の馬について話す時

translation.en: I say, "The kids are out together," because they are kids.
translation.ja: “うちの子たち”と呼んでしまう

translation.en: They're my children, even though I've got Patrick.
translation.ja: 息子がいるが馬たちも子供だ

translation.en: When I first got Juniper, that horse taught me so much
translation.ja: ジュニパーを飼った時多くのことを学んだよ

translation.en: of being patient and being humble and excited.
translation.ja: ジュニパーを飼った時多くのことを学んだよ 忍耐 謙虚さ 感動を覚えたね

translation.en: He would do better than I had ever thought an animal could ever do.
translation.ja: 想像以上の能力の持ち主だった

translation.en: And you'd only have to show him once, and bang, he got it.
translation.ja: １回で すぐ理解するんだ

translation.en: Good boy, Jun.
translation.ja: いい子だな

translation.en: He built me, and he built this ranch.
translation.ja: 今の私があるのはジュニパーのおかげ

translation.en: Juniper was getting old. He was in his thirties.
translation.ja: ジュニパーが30代の時だった

translation.en: The young man that I had here signaled to me.
translation.ja: 牧場にいた若者が私に言った

translation.en: He said, "You know, you'd better come in. I think Juniper is really, really sick."
translation.ja: “ジュニパーの体調が最悪なので 戻ってほしい”

translation.en: And he must have hung on till I got home.
translation.ja: ジュニパーは待っててくれて私は抱きしめたよ

translation.en: And I got there and put him in my arms and just… knelt down there with him,
translation.ja: ジュニパーは待っててくれて私は抱きしめたよ 私がひざまずくと最後に いなないた

translation.en: and, you know, he gave that last little whinny
translation.ja: 私がひざまずくと最後に いなないた

translation.en: and then was gone.
translation.ja: そして あの世へ

translation.en: [boy on TV] How'd you know when he was gonna draw?
translation.ja: 彼が撃つと？

translation.en: [man on TV] By watching his eyes.
translation.ja: 目を見りゃ分かる　覚えとけ

translation.en: -Remember that. -[boy on TV] I will.
translation.ja: 目を見りゃ分かる　覚えとけ ああ

translation.en: Come on, guys. Line up. Come on. School time.
translation.ja: 並んでくれ　学校の時間だよ

translation.en: Mrs. Parker loves to give smiles. -Mrs. Parker. -[clicking]
translation.ja: パーカー夫人は笑顔を見せてくれる　ほら

translation.en: Good girl.
translation.ja: それだよ

translation.en: Good girl.
translation.ja: いいね

translation.en: Once the horse gets the spark, I'm the flint.
translation.ja: 馬が やる気になったら私は火打ち石

translation.en: And all of a sudden, the animal just comes alive, and he's got it.
translation.ja: 突然 馬は生き生きして理解するんだよ

translation.en: [Robin] As much love as you can put into them, they're gonna give it back to you.
translation.ja: 愛情を注げば同じだけの愛を返してくれる

translation.en: But if you can stand there and hold that, like… [gasps]
translation.ja: そこに じっと立ち尽くせばまるで…

translation.en: …it's a world.
translation.ja: 世界だよ
